name: Abyss (itch) (7fault Dev Team)
description:
A poor little fish has been blown away from home, find its way back through the abyss and its dangers. 

Build your friendship with the creatures of the abyss, but do not neglect them or they will vanish away. 

Let them help you fight your way to your home by dashing into enemies.

Important : use arrow keys instead of ZQSD as the help suggests at the beginning of the game.

Realized within GGJ2019, see https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/abyss
